com.morpheus.sdk.infrastructure

Class UpdateServerGroupRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.morpheus.sdk.internal.AbstractApiRequest<UpdateServerGroupResponse>
      • com.morpheus.sdk.infrastructure.UpdateServerGroupRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApiRequest<UpdateServerGroupResponse>

    public class UpdateServerGroupRequest
extends AbstractApiRequest<UpdateServerGroupResponse>
    A request object for defining a request for updating a specific server group within the Morpheus Account. Typically this object is called from the MorpheusClient class and is used to update a specific ServerGroup object. Example Usage: 
         
     	MorpheusClient client = new MorpheusClient(credentialsProvider);
     	UpdateServerGroupRequest request = new UpdateServerGroupRequest().serverGroupId(1).serverGroup(updatedServerGroup)
     	UpdateServerGroupsResponse response = client.updateServerGroup(request);
     	return response.success;
